Html: Is it possible to generate an arbitrary waveform such as a series of summed sine waves and then send the result to the audio outputs using this library. I would also like to send this continuously while being able to change waveform parameters.

Hi sqtech,

You defiantly could use NAudio to stream the content of your generated waveforms out a sound device.

In terms of the generation of these waveforms, you would need to complete the calculations based on the type of parameters you would like to use and then store the results in a stream in PCM format. The mixing of these streams would be easily handled by NAudio however the sine wave calculations and manupulation would be up to you to complete and send to the streams you are mixing.

Cheers,
Sebastian
